Rewards Rate: 6X Avios/₹200 at Preferred Destinations (POS Only), 5X Avios/₹200 for Spends on Qatar/British Airways Website, 3X Avios/₹200 for Online Spends at Preferred Destinations and 1X Avios/₹200 for Spends on Utilities, Insurance and Government Services
Reward Redemption: Avios earned can be redeemed against a host of different options at the Qatar Airways or British Airways website
Travel: Airport meet and greet, complimentary domestic and international lounge access, 10% discount on Qatar Airways flights from India
International Lounge Access: 2 international lounge access per quarter with Priority Pass
Insurance Benefits: Travel Insurance, Air Accident Cover, and International Travel Health Insurance

fees_charges.Foreign Currency Markup: 1.5% at Preferred International Destinations and 3.5% Everywhere Else
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver for Fuel Spends Between ₹500 and ₹10,000

product_details: Bonus 20,000 Avios as a welcome benefit.
2x Avios per Rs. 200 spent on Qatar or British Airways website and 1x Avios on other domestic and international spends.
5x Avios per Rs. 200 spent at preferred international destinations.
Low forex markup fee of 1.5% at preferred international destinations.
Up to 36,000 Avios as a milestone benefit on reaching the target spend.
Bonus 5000 Avios as a renewal benefit.
2 International lounge access per quarter with Priority Pass membership and 2 domestic lounge access per quarter.
Airport meet and greet service and personal concierge service.
Travel-related insurance benefits and 1% fuel surcharge waiver.
